instruction: Generate a chart for the data given below.
input:

| City | Crime |
|------|-------|
| NYC | 390.5 |
| San Francisco | 161.1 |
| Los Angeles | 426.1 |
| Houston | 902.2 |
| Chicago | 741.5 |
output:

San Francisco: 161.1
